title: mri_gradunwarp
description: Tool to correct gradient non-linearity distortions in MRI images.

gradient_coeff.title: Gradient Coefficient File
gradient_coeff.description: Gradient coefficient input file (not to be used with --load_transtbl)

load_transtbl.title: Load Transform Table
load_transtbl.description: Load unwarp transform table in m3z format (not to be used with --gradcoeff)

out_transtbl.title: Output Transform Table
out_transtbl.description: Save unwarp transform table in m3z format

save_transtbl_only.title: Save Table Only Flag
save_transtbl_only.description: Just save unwarp transform table in m3z format, requires --gradcoeff

interpolation_type.title: Interpolation Type
interpolation_type.description: Interpolation method: nearest | trilinear | cubic (default is trilinear)

checkopts.title: Check Options Flag
checkopts.description: Don't run anything, just check options and exit

help.title: Help Flag
help.description: Print out information on how to use this program
